```{r}
dice <- function(faces=6,n=100)
{
  sample(x=seq(from=1,to=faces,by=1),size=n,replace=TRUE);
}

dice(6,400)
```



```{r}

experiment <- function(faces=6,n=100)
{
  dice1 <- dice(faces,n);
  dice2 <- dice(faces,n);
  dice3 <- dice(faces,n);
  
  
  data.frame(Dice1=dice1,
              Dice2=dice2,
              Dice3=dice3);
  
  
}

experiment(6,400)

```

```{r}
library(dplyr);
experiment(faces=6,n=400) %>%
  mutate(Somme=Dice1 + Dice2 +Dice3)->df02
df02;

```


```{r}
library(dplyr);
df02 %>%
  group_by(Somme) %>%
  summarize(N=n());
```

```{r}
library(dplyr);
library(ggplot2);
experiment(n=1E6) %>%
  mutate(Somme=Dice1 + Dice2 +Dice3) %>%
   group_by(Somme) %>%
   summarize(N=n()) %>%
   mutate(P=N/1E6) %>%
   ggplot(aes(x=as.factor(Somme),y=P)) + geom_point();
```
```{r}
library(dplyr);
library(ggplot2);
experiment(6,1E6) %>%
  mutate(Sum=Dice1 + Dice2 +Dice3) %>%
   ggplot(aes(x=as.factor(Sum))) +
    geom_bar(aes(y=(..count..)/sum(..count..)),width=.3) +
    xlab("Valeur de la somme")+ylab("Fr√©quence") +
    ylim(0,NA)+
    theme_bw()
```
